title.narrative: SSC in Veterinary and Food Safety within the Colombian pig meat sector - Phase II

description.narrative:
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on Food Safety in Colombia contributes to food safety framework conditions that support safe food products and production, positive impact on public health by:
-supporting a clear and effective national plan for Residues of medicines and chemicals contamination in food of animal origin. - Strengthening national capacity to handle antibiotic-resistant pathogens - Developing a plan for official intervention in case of animal disasters outbreak - Developing an Inspection, Surveillance, Operation control system to meet international requirements - strengthening national system to verify animal welfare and meet international standards - Developing a cooperative model for small hold farmers (pig producers)

title.narrative: Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
